## Description {#details}

An analysis over an &quot;outer&quot; IR unit that provides access to an analysis manager over an &quot;inner&quot; IR unit.

The inner unit must be contained in the outer unit.

For example, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inneranalysismanagerproxy">InnerAnalysisManagerProxy&lt;FunctionAnalysisManager, Module&gt;</a> is an analysis over Modules (the &quot;outer&quot; unit) that provides access to a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> analysis manager. The <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adce09a5a0de0e3177eb00e932734af2f">FunctionAnalysisManager</a> is the &quot;inner&quot; manager being proxied, and Functions are the &quot;inner&quot; unit. The inner/outer relationship is valid because each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> is contained in one <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a>.

If you&#39;re (transitively) within a pass manager for an IR unit U that contains IR unit V, you should never use an analysis manager over V, except via one of these proxies.

Note that the proxy&#39;s result is a move-only RAII object. The validity of the analyses in the inner analysis manager is tied to its lifetime.

Definition at line 565 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanager-h">PassManager.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### run() {#a3add1957ddf106ee6dc26ce921d8efd4}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename AnalysisManagerT, typename IRUnitT, typename... ExtraArgTs&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>Result llvm::InnerAnalysisManagerProxy&lt; AnalysisManagerT, IRUnitT, ExtraArgTs &gt;::run (IRUnitT &amp; IR, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysismanager">AnalysisManager</a>&lt; IRUnitT, ExtraArgTs... &gt; &amp; AM, ExtraArgTs...)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Run the analysis pass and create our proxy result object.

This doesn&#39;t do any interesting work; it is primarily used to insert our proxy result object into the outer analysis cache so that we can proxy invalidation to the inner analysis manager.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanager-h/#l00628">628</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanager-h">PassManager.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
